org.dyn4j.dynamics

Interface StepListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Listener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StepAdapter

    public interface StepListener
extends Listener
    Listener notified before and after a simulation step by the World.

    Modification of the World is permitted in any of these methods.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.0
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void begin(Step step, World world)
      Called before a simulation step is performed.
      void end(Step step, World world)
      Called after a simulation step has been performed.
      void updatePerformed(Step step, World world)
      Called after collision detection and contact updates have been performed due to a call to the World.setUpdateRequired(boolean) passing true.

    • Method Detail

      • begin

        void begin(Step step,
         World world)
        Called before a simulation step is performed.
        Parameters:
        step - the step information
        world - the simulation World

      • updatePerformed

        void updatePerformed(Step step,
                   World world)
        Called after collision detection and contact updates have been performed due to a call to the World.setUpdateRequired(boolean) passing true.
        Parameters:
        step - the step information
        world - the simulation World
        Since:
        3.0.1
        See Also:
        World.setUpdateRequired(boolean)

      • end

        void end(Step step,
       World world)
        Called after a simulation step has been performed.
        Parameters:
        step - the step information
        world - the simulation World
